author: ryan
msg: SOLR-142: Added RawResponseWriter and ShowFileRequestHandler.  This returns config files directly.  If the AdminHandlers is configured, this will be added automatically.

author: phred
msg: Check for Apache::Test v1.30, needed to run the tests (t_write_test_lib).
Don't run any tests if Apache::Test isn't installed.

author: rajith
msg: I noticed that the asString() method will rebuild the string from scratch each time. So I cached the String and the char[] after it builds the first time.
